website_summaries.verdict: Offered in 4 different scents, these glove deodorizers have a thick design so they'll stay in place.
pros: Deodorizer pads contain a mixture of moisture absorption materials and scented materials to keep gloves smelling fresh
Works well for thicker, larger gloves, as the deodorizing pads are thick
cons: Scent will fade from the deodorizing pads after a few months

customer_reviews.title: These made me a hero
customer_reviews.text: I go to a CKO gym and recommend these to people every day. I like to go to other members and be like hey smell my glove just for the look of insanity they would give me like I am asking them to sniff Bigfoot's genitals. When they do they instantly ask how my gloves don't smell of cheese left out to bake in the sun, these are my answer. Best think you can ever do if you have stank glove.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Haber

customer_reviews.title: SCENT IS OVERPOWERING- if you have a sensitive nose, then beware.
customer_reviews.text: Ultimately, the scent is way way too strong and gave me a headache. I used this product for about 2 months before writing this review, hoping that the scent would fade. The fresh linen scent smells like really strong, bad cologne. it makes everything in your gym bag, your trunk, and everything within 10 feet smell like bad cologne. I couldn't do my workouts because my gloves smelled like it. It does a really nice job of keeping your gloves together, and I think it does a nice job of keeping the inside dry. I wish they would sell an "unscented" version.
customer_reviews.author: Cali Cat-daddy

customer_reviews.title: Keeps the gloves and mitts dry and smelling good. UPDATE 1/13/16
customer_reviews.text: Keeps the gloves and mitts dry and smelling good. UPDATE 1/13/16: have had to sew up a few holes already, material is wearing along seams UPDATED 5/5/16: Customer service is great, they are sending me a replacement no questions asked. The other pair I have are holding up well
customer_reviews.author: Brian Diffley

customer_reviews.title: Great product and very potent when brand new
customer_reviews.text: So far I tried them out and they are great they absorb all the moisture and leave your gloves smelling fresh. Just be warned that when they're new they are very strong smell and they could smell up an entire room. The only reason I'm not giving it 5 stars is because after the use when I put my gloves on to spar I wiped my eyes with my hands and my wraps smelled strongly of the scent that I ordered and a little bit afterwards my eyes started burning I had to rinse them out but other than that there was no problem.
customer_reviews.author: humberto

customer_reviews.title: Works great for a few weeks
customer_reviews.text: The scent was very refreshing and I would slip these inside my boxing gloves and inner handwraps to absorb the moisture and keep them from getting smelly. These worked absolutely wonderful for about 3 weeks. Now there is almost no scent left and they are keeping equipment fresh anymore. I will exchange them in hopes that maybe i just got one out of bad batch. We'll see how the new one holds up. I will definitely update my review if the replacements do better but right now i can't even recommend these to the guys i box with anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew M. Randolph

customer_reviews.title: Don't mess around. Get these.
customer_reviews.text: Not kidding with you - this is the only option you will want to choose. If you own boxing gloves, just consider this part of the glove. It is that important for you to get it. The scent options are almost all good. The linen one is easily my favorite. The scent is POWERFUL out of the box, the first few days. Seriously strong, but that's because it's going to last. 3 days in the open air in the garage and they mellowed out significantly. 6 months of multiple-week-use and they're still perfect. The scent is good, quality is great, holding up to the gym bag and in/out of the glove without a single flaw.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Jensen

customer_reviews.title: Meets expectations
customer_reviews.text: These seem to be doing a great job of keeping my gloves fresh. After wearing the same pair of boxing gloves through back to back kickboxing and krav maga classes (apx 2 hours combined duration), they are usually quite damp. I've been inserting the glove deoderizers asap after finishing my training for the day and am hopeful that they will help prolong the life of my equipment. It's only been a couple weeks so far. My only "complaint" is that the aroma of this product was almost overpoweringly strong at first. It's better now. When the time comes to replace them I will probably try the lavender scent instead (I think the one I bought is called fresh linen).
customer_reviews.author: MichelleV

customer_reviews.title: Powerful smell, your sparring partner will love it.
customer_reviews.text: I got the Cedar version of these glove dogs. Everyone in my gym loves it, every time I hit the heavy bags it smells like Christmas. Working the heavy bags? Be transported to a wonderful forest as your gloves unleash a fresh torrent of cedar scented air around you. My first time sparring after getting these my partner couldn't concentrate because all he could think about was how good my gloves smelled. In all honesty, they do a great job of helping my gloves dry and keeping them smelling fresh. I've already got a couple more gym partners to pick these up since I started using them.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Ray

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed/ Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed in item. I kickbox every day and needed something to kill the sweat and sweat smell in my gloves. The glove deodorizer have an overwhelming smell of linen before you even take it out of the packaging. I tried them the 1st night and the smell was overwhelming and when I went to class the overwhelming linen smell + the sweat smell during class was enough to make me gag. Not impressed and very disappointed was hoping it was going to be a worthwhile item but is isn’t.
customer_reviews.author: Roccosmsma

customer_reviews.title: Don't prevent stink in boxing gloves
customer_reviews.text: bought these with a new pair of gloves to give them a fighting chance at preventing that stinky odor that comes with continued use of boxing gloves. After less than 2 months of using these faithfully (I put them in my gloves immediately after my workout and don't take them out until the next workout 1-4 days later), my gloves are getting stinky. I am not an excessive sweater. And they smell great at first, but don't ACTUALLY prevent the odor problem. Very very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Kate Demello

customer_reviews.title: They last forever....
customer_reviews.text: I just purchased my second pair. The first pair lasted 18 months! That's boxing twice a week, every week for 18 months. My first pair I purchased in the lavender scent. They don't just cover up the smell, they absorb moisture and actually get rid of the smell. This time I tried the fresh linen and I like it. They do come out of the package with a very strong scent. I hang mine in the garage for 48 hours before using them. The garage smells nice and then my gloves smell nice. Win/Win.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm!
customer_reviews.text: I've been kickboxing for about 5 months now. My first pair of gloves smelled disgusting after only a few days, my hands sweat a lot apparently. Eventually, I couldn't handle it anymore as, when holding my fists up to guard my face, the smell was getting to me. I tried at home formulas to remove the smell, none worked. Took a chance on these and couldn't be happier. They work like a charm! The only reason I am giving it 4 stars is that it only worked for about 3 months before it's deodorizing abilities became pretty much non-existent. However, I didn't expect it to work forever and already have ordered my second one. I would absolutely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jon M.

customer_reviews.title: These are awesome at what they do. The scent is a little overwhelming.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the cologne version and have to say that this product works incredibly well. Everything was well packaged and as promised. I am thankful there is a product out there like this. The scent is a little overwhelming if you leave them in the car (i.e., put them in the gloves and keep them in your gym bag). My suggestion would be: (1) definitely get this product, and, (2) when you get home from using the gloves put these in and then take them out and leave them at home when you pop them back in your gym bag. Will likely seal in a ziplock when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: gdouglas

customer_reviews.title: Smells good but STRONG
customer_reviews.text: Smells great but it is super strong. For me this is a plus, because my gym bag was stinking up my car and my room. Now my entire room and gym bag smell like this deoterizor so it worked out great for me, not sure if other people feel the same. I read reviews that it was strong but was not expecting it to be that strong. Even when I'm fighting everyone compliments me on how good they smell. The only drawback is that the first week I took it out out of the bag, it smelled so strong it was actually burning my nostrils when I stayed too close for it for too long.
customer_reviews.author: MH Bausch

customer_reviews.title: Knockout Smell.
customer_reviews.text: Before buying I always read reviews with a grain of salt...however the more unfavorable reviews of this product were spot on. I put these in after my last training session, a few days later I gloved up and worked out, took my gloves off and my hands smelled like lavender s**t. These are WAY too potent. I hung them up in my garage (a little bigger than a two car garage) lol and the smell is still an over powering punch up the nose. These things are perfect for making an aircraft hangar smell nice.
customer_reviews.author: LRaeMcD

customer_reviews.title: Ordered the cologne version and love it very much
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the cologne version and love it very much! The smell can be overpowering at times, but overall I love this product! I usually spray and rub down the inside of my gloves with alcohol or lysol, let that dry out for a bit and then I shove these deodorizers in. Works great and would buy again! Update: scent dramatically reduces to almost non existent after about 5 months or so
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Day 1: Optimistic
customer_reviews.text: Very scented right out of the package. I've just started boxing/kickboxing for fitness and my gloves dont have that bad of a smell yet but I know they will if I didnt get something to deodorize. Using- to get them all the way down into the hand of my gloves I had to smooth some of the inner material away from the end to get it to fit. But once closed up I could pick them up from the strap and they won't budge. So Day one I'm optimistic. I'll update this review in a few weeks to see if the linen smell dissipates and if they keep my gloves fresh, since they have a clean slate to work with.
customer_reviews.author: Sue D Nym

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY: Pungent smell that never goes away
customer_reviews.text: I got the "fresh linen" scent, but the pungent smell is way too overwhelming. It rubs off on anything it touches. I had it in my gym bag and opened it inside the locker room, the woman standing 8 feet away smelled it immediately and made a comment about how strong the smell is. I was so embarrassed. I put it in ziploc bags with tiny holes, left it outdoors overnight, didn't help curb the smell at all. I ended up throwing it away. DO NOT BUY. I would much rather prefer the smell of musty/used boxing gloves over this "fresh linen" deodorizer that gives me a headache!
customer_reviews.author: Jill M

customer_reviews.title: They last!
customer_reviews.text: I waited a few months to write my review. I received them 3 months ago & they're still doing their job. After each workout, I wipe down the inside of the gloves with a towel. Then I put my gloves in front of a fan so the air can blow through them. Afterwards, I put these glove deodorizers inside until my next kickboxing class. 3 months of this routine & they're doing just fine. I also wear hand wraps when I use my gloves, if that helps anyone reading this review. Overall a great product, no tears, no holes in the deodorizers, etc.
customer_reviews.author: shucky

customer_reviews.title: 2/5 Here's why
customer_reviews.text: These smell fantastic. No question there. The problem is the cedar stays in your gloves. I train Muay Thai and am constantly removing my heavy gloves to change to mitt gloves, or mitts, or thai pads. The cedar gets into your hand wraps and any time you touch your face, you're in for a time. It's like getting hit with light OC spray (mace) not to mention if it gets into your eyes. I now use these for my truck, because they smell so good. I would never use these again inside my gloves.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn M.

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these! I started kickboxing and the fabric of the gloves smell HORRIBLE. I knew I needed some kind of deodorizer for them. I put these in right after my workouts and they make everything smell amazing. They’re even helpful for carrying. I read some reviews that the scent was too strong. I think it’s just right. I find it to be the equivalent of a dryer sheet for the wash. Smells wonderful! Using these for two months now and they still smell great!
customer_reviews.author: ML

customer_reviews.title: Sweaty Hand, Don't stink it up. Deodorizer.
customer_reviews.text: There are many ways to absorb the sweat from gloves. News paper, paper towels, old cloths, etc. But this product works better then i imagined. It's been a few months and they still smell great. Who hasn't forgotten or just to exhausted to stuff there gloves. I know i have and they started to smell. Boxing a few friends they can smell the punch to the head. But once I use this product there is now a pleasantness while getting hit in the head. A sweet aroma as a fist flus past there face. I'm happier and they are definitely so.
customer_reviews.author: Arman A

customer_reviews.title: Nearly a year later and my gloves still smell great
customer_reviews.text: I tell everyone in the gym to pick some of these up when they start to complain that their gloves stink. I've had these for awhile now, I believe it is creeping up onto a years time. And my gloves STILL smell great and these deodorizers are still going strong. A awesome value for the money. For around 10 dollars you can have fresh smelling gloves for year(s). Worth it in my book. When these finally kick the bucket, I will be back to buy another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Khamiko K.

customer_reviews.title: Great deodorizer, lasts a long time
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these! I have three overall. The scent lasts forever. I have had two for about 2 years for my snowboots and they're still deodorizing to this day. I have another pair for my regular shoes because well I have stinky feet 😂 it super deodorizes each pair of shoes I put it in. It feels a little bit expensive because there are a lot of other cheaper options but the smell in these things last for a very long time. So long that I can't actually tell you because I haven't hit that mark yet.
customer_reviews.author: Diana-Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Trust all these reviews! Very strong/effective
customer_reviews.text: After reading through these reviews, I figured I’d give them a try! They do smell VERY strong, but thankfully I don’t mind the Fresh Linen smell... with that being said, I will not be using these every time I take off my gloves OR leave them in my gym bag. I left them in my gloves for 1 day and was hit in the face with Fresh Linen my entire boxing class the next day! Will be using another reviewers suggestion and putting them in a plastic bag until I feel my gloves need a little touch up smell-good! Lol! Proceed with caution :)
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: For soccer gks!!!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is a soccer goalkeeper. Plays competitively with a team that travels, so you know she's wearing her goalkeeping gloves every single day. Awesome for her developement as a player, but along with the wear and tear on the gloves comes a certain odor. This product smells nice, and also seems to absorb sweat nicely so her gloves are dry for the next match. Very important!! She can't have any slip on the inside of her glove. I'm going to buy again. If your kiddo is a soccer goalkeeper, this is the answer for sweaty, stinkly gloves!
customer_reviews.author: amazon shopper

customer_reviews.title: This will make your entire house STINK!!
customer_reviews.text: Took these out of the bag to put in my boxing gloves and got punched in the face with a purfume smell that could mask the stench of a rotting corpse, and not in a good way. 2 hours after unleashing these, my whole house smelled like a French brothel. My wife threw up in her mouth a little when she got home and smelled it. When I explained the source of the smell and need, she insisted they be destroyed. Now she doesn’t complain about the sweat stink of my boxing gloves, so I guess they did solve the ultimate problem in the end; get my wife to stop complaining about the smell in my boxing gloves.
customer_reviews.author: michael lEMELIN

customer_reviews.title: Be careful the scent is powerful and a bit much
customer_reviews.text: The scent is absolutely pungent!! Way too strong. Even if you didn’t mind the scent I have no idea how you’d live with it. I bought these and used to keep my boxing gloves in my house. Couldn’t any longer. I tried airing these out and it didn’t help. I then put them in my garage (very large two car) and my entire garage wreaked of the scent and it honestly made everyone I know grossed out. When I drove them to return them I drove them outside of the car as the plastic bag tied wasn’t enough to have them on the car
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little scared after reading the reviews that all said the scent was overpowering, but I was desperate enough to get them anyways. Upon receiving my pair, there was definitely a strong scent of cedar, but I figured I'd rather have my gloves and gym bag reeking of the woods than stinking up my entire car with rancid body odor (I keep my stuff in my trunk). After a week, the odor lessened and I'm happy to say the product really works!! The scent doesn't just cover up the smell, it absorbs the stink just as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Reyn

customer_reviews.title: Saved my gloves, but man its strong!
customer_reviews.text: I had a pair of gloves I use for muay thai and they were starting to stink due to both their age and a select few times where I trained without hand wraps (ALWAYS use hand wraps!!). I bought this product hoping it would solve the problem and it did just that. My gloves no longer stink and I can train again without having to worry about the stink rubbing off on my wraps. The only small complaint I have, similar to the other reviewers, is that the scent is REALLY STRONG. Its a little more manageable after a couple months, but still a little overwhelming at times. Overall, happy with the purchase and I would recommend them to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Surfrider0414

customer_reviews.title: No more stinky gloves
customer_reviews.text: So happy to have these odor eaters! I purchased the fresh linen scent and as soon as you take it out of the package you get that scent of clean clothes It is strong at first but as it absorbs the odors it will get less. Bonus that if you have gloves like mine that are velcro strapped it gives you a handle to carry both gloves together. I even tuck my inner gloves (so over the time it takes to do traditional wrapping) and my heart rate monitor into the gloves to get the stink out. I would highly recommend the fresh linen scent and once these are done i'll be ordering another set.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly R.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for making stinky gloves not stink!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little apprehensive after reading reviews that the fragrance was way too strong. When I received mine an opened the package I was a little underwhelmed at the lack of over powering scent. They smell great, not overpowering. I put them in my gloves and threw them in my gear bag. I checked them that night and there was only a very faint stink smell left. My other gear smelled good too, but you couldn't smell the cedar cent once my bag was zipped shut. I would recommend these to everyone. I will definitely be keeping a set of these in my bag from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Lee B.

customer_reviews.title: Kept for less time than desired but worked as expected while I used it
customer_reviews.text: The scent is great and it definitely made me feel like sweat was being absorbed (even if that's not what scientifically was happening). I thought my gloves (which normally smell terrible without any odor freshener) smelled great, better than out of the bag. the only down side is that the deoderizer deteriorated pretty quickly so I only got a two-ish week use out of them before I could only use them for a portion of my gloves (because they shrunk so much).
customer_reviews.author: Christine Dela Rosa

customer_reviews.title: I am very sensitive to certain scents so went with cedar and am very pleased. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I use my gloves at least 3 days a week to cardio kickboxing classes and they stink after my workout. These have made a big difference! I put them inside gloves after workout and they absorb the moisture and odor. I am very sensitive to certain scents so went with cedar and am very pleased. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: janet m guardado

customer_reviews.title: Phenomenal deodorizer!
customer_reviews.text: I had to get an deodorizer for my gloves because after a while I knew my gloves would reek. Got this on a recommendation from my sparring partner and I love it! To make them last longer, I leave the deodorizer overnight and put them right back in the plastic bag they came in. The order can be strong on a small confined space, hence the reason I put them back in the bag. As far as the product it works like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: Dre

customer_reviews.title: These smell awful.
customer_reviews.text: I was that this would have a heavy chemical smell (like most fake scents of lavender, cedar, ect.) Normally It wouldn't be too much of an issue, but the smell is VERY potent. outside of the plastic bag the scent carries throughout the entire house. It feels as if it burns my nostrils as well. The only way i could handle it was to put them my boxing gloves and tie them into 2 plastic bags... which... i have yet to untie... If you like the chemical odor that most products of this nature has then this might be the product for you but if you don't i'd strongly avoid it.
customer_reviews.author: Valdrake

customer_reviews.title: Completely freshens smelly gloves
customer_reviews.text: My kickboxing gloves smelled horrendous and no amount of cleaning or airing out could fix the issue. Thank goodness these deodorizers work so well, otherwise I would've had to purchase new gloves! Now I simply wipe my gloves inside and out with a towel after every kickboxing session, then allow them to air dry with these inserts, and voila! My gloves are fresh and smelling like cedar for the next use. My wraps and gym bag now smell vaguely of cedar, too, but it isn't overpowering and is very much preferable to sweat!
customer_reviews.author: JamieTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Smells great, strange powder stains.
customer_reviews.text: First and foremost these smell great and are very powerful. I've had mine for a few months and they leave my gloves and gym bag smelling great, even from a distance. Now the bad part, I don't know what it is but the deodorizers started to 'leak' this orangeish brown powder? Whatever it was stained EVERYTHING in my bag which totally ruined the appeal of these. I sort of want to order another but not sure if I want to risk another 'dye pack bomb' going off in my bag.
customer_reviews.author: Javy

customer_reviews.title: Wore out quick...
customer_reviews.text: As with any air freshener, these came on quite strong! I ordered the cologne scented inserts. During the first week, my boys’ hockey gloves and skates were smelling amazing. The scent even overpowered the rancid smell in some locker rooms we were in! Then by week 3, the scent was hardly detectable and the inserts were ineffective for helping equipment smells.
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: These are awesome. 2 years and still going strong!
customer_reviews.text: ***Updated review*** These are awesome and I’ve finally ordered my second set. The first pair kept my gloves dry and smelling like a cedar Forrest for a solid two years. I use my gloves about 4 nights a week and they are wet and gross when I’m done. The next day my gym bag always smells forest fresh. The smell has slowly faded over the last few months so I figured it was finally time for a second set. These blew away my expectations and I will continue to buy these as long as I’m doing martial arts or anything with a gym bag that can use some freshening.
customer_reviews.author: Casper Felix

customer_reviews.title: Too strong!
customer_reviews.text: Wasted my money on this. Ordered lavender because I thought it would be the most mild of the options, but I had to throw them out in the snow minutes are opening them. My eyes are burning, and my head is pounding. I would not want my hands smelling like this after a workout. Complete garbage. I wanted a sweat dryer and odor neutralizer, not a toilet spray scented pod that’s clearly just going to mask odor instead of neutralize it.
customer_reviews.author: GotCats?

customer_reviews.title: Do the job but horrid scent
customer_reviews.text: These work for keeping my gloves from reeking, but the fake pine scent is so strong it's kind of gross. Definitely does not smell like cedar. Smells like fake pine scent was added to whatever is inside of these. When I first got them, being near them almost made my skin hurt, the fake scent is so strong. Scent has dissipated a bit now so not as bad.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They work!
customer_reviews.text: These have been working GREAT for my boxing gloves. I had tried carbon ones that were completely useless. My hands would stink so badly after only 20 minutes of boxing, never mind the smell that came from my gloves. And I was being good about wiping them with disinfectant wipes after each use as well. The Meister Glove Deodorizers take away the nasty smells and leave behind a nice fresh scent. I am loving them! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Angela P.

customer_reviews.title: WORKS!
customer_reviews.text: Works great - and for awhile! I got the linen smell - it doesn’t smell like linen to me but it’s a nice scent. A little strong at first but after a week or so it’s just a steady nice smell. I switch it up between gym and work shoes in a gym bag. These also work nicely if you hang them in a closet, especially if you store a lot of shoes in said closet!
customer_reviews.author: SHoov

customer_reviews.title: but not as bad as other reviews had made it seem
customer_reviews.text: This is REALLY fragrant, but not as bad as other reviews had made it seem. I don't think you're supposed to keep them in your gloves every time you are not using them. I put them in at least once a week until the next time I use them to give them a little fresh up every now and again. They are a great quality product though and I believe the strong fragrance will keep these going for a long long time. Im satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: Smells great, got lots of compliments
customer_reviews.text: I go to Tiger Schulmann's Kickboxing classes 3x a week and these work great! I got the clean linen smell and got plenty of compliments from my classmates. The smell is really strong too - I bring my gym bag to my bedroom, and it makes the whole bedroom smell nice and fresh. All of my gear in my gym bag also smell great - towel, change of clothes, gloves, socks, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's a love/hate relationship
customer_reviews.text: I both love and hate these. I LOVE that they are extremely effective when it comes to absorbing sweat from my gloves. I wish things were different but, after an hour of kickboxing, I can sweat like a beast. I love that using these helps control the wet, smelly after effect that gloves can get. However, the deodorizing scent they use in these is SO STRONG, that anything near my gloves (such as my wraps, ankle supports, bag, etc) reek of "fresh linen". Its like living in a laundry mat. I may end up trying a different scent, at a later time, and seeing if that improves anything.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smells WAY too strong for my liking
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping these were unscented. I did not realize that they were fresh linen scent. It gave me an instant headache. Now my gloves smell like it every time I work out. Even though I put them in only once. My entire car smells like it now too, and I returned it. I hated this product. It smells like strong chemical laden laundry detergent. Not what I wanted. I am not a fan of artificial smells. If you like that sort of thing, then these work well. Personally I hated it.
customer_reviews.author: Owen's mommy

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price but can be a bit pungent at first.
customer_reviews.text: They're a little too fragrant just out of the box. My whole bedroom smelled like the glove deodorizer. I also noticed that my sweat would really sting my eyes if I wiped my forehead with my glove. All-in-all they DO work to get your gloves less nasty. I find they dry my gloves out completely if I work out every other day. When I work out 5 days in a row, they are always wet the next day.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon H.

customer_reviews.title: "I PITY DA FOO" - who doesn't buy these for their gloves
customer_reviews.text: Just started a boxing class and the pair of gloves I borrowed smelled like sweaty pickle feet. NASTY. Saw good reviews on these and have been using them a few weeks. The scent (linen fresh) is SUPER strong, filled a 15 foot radius with scent. But my gloves don't stink. The scent is starting to calm down. My living room smells fresh too though LOL.
customer_reviews.author: CJWA 805

customer_reviews.title: Love the way your fingers smell!
customer_reviews.text: No boxing movie is realistic unless the boxer gets caught sniffing his/her fingers after a long set of bag work. Gloves and wraps get sweaty. They start to stink. I thought I could get away with just airing out my gloves, but that's not good enough. These (I got cedar) do a really good job of keeping the funk at bay.
customer_reviews.author: C.K.

customer_reviews.title: Works but maybe too much?
customer_reviews.text: Ok I’m conflicted on how to review because technically it ‘does it’s job’ by deodorizing. BUT it is SO potent. And the smell is not necessarily a good one. It’s more musty and overpowering. I gave it as a gift to my mom and she said her entire apartment smelled of this when she got home at night. There should be different scent options.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I thought I was going to use this for my goalie blocker/catcher but ended up using it for the chin strap on my mask. This thing is amazing! I sandwich the strap between the two fat ends and the next day, the strap is dry and smells slightly cedar-y, but not so much that it's annoying when I wear the mask. I love these.
customer_reviews.author: Standoffish Dan

customer_reviews.title: great for lots of uses
customer_reviews.text: these glove deodorizers WORK. scent is strong but I am ok with that. I think they would work for shoes, closets, etc. I have the lavender and really like it. the cedar scent would be great for shoes and closets. I have glove deodorizers from a competitor (rhymes with 'neverlast') and you can not even tell they are scented.
customer_reviews.author: Susan D.

customer_reviews.title: A must have for your boxing gloves
customer_reviews.text: These are a must for boxing gloves. I had to trash two pairs of gloves due to not being able to control the foul scent that comes with using them daily. These deodorizers have kept my gloves smelling fresh. They help to eliminate the moisture left in the gloves and the scent is perfect. I highly recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: Steve Silva

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Have had this for over a month and I place it in my gloves every time I’m done working out. I train 4 days a week and my gloves still smell great.
customer_reviews.author: Edgar G.

customer_reviews.title: To strong chemical odor
customer_reviews.text: I got the cedar set hoping they would be less potent than other scents. Not so. It isn't a natural cedar scent, but a VERY strong chemical odor that burns my eyes and lingers. Five minutes after opening the package, it received a spousal banishment from the house because of the overpowering smell. It managed to stink up a three car garage despite both ends being stuffed in gloves. Now they sit outside, maybe some day they will be mellower. Meanwhile I don't know if I will ever get the odor out of my gloves :(.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Simply Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: These have changed our world. For years I have had to deal with my boyfriend's smelly gloves stinking up the house. These deodorizers were able to salvage a pair of old gloves that were previously thought to have been consumed by the stink in addition to protecting the new gloves from suffering the same fate.
customer_reviews.author: ccommons

customer_reviews.title: Overpowering Scent
customer_reviews.text: I got the linen scented one, and while the quality of the scent is not in and of it self bad, the volume of the scent is absolutely overpowering and makes my entire apartment smell like a chemical-heavy laundry detergent. I guess that's better than boxing glove stink permeating the apartment, but either way they've been relegated to living on the patio. I've had these about a month and there has been no decrease in the volume of the linen scent as I had hoped. Starting to look for something a little less heavy-handed.
customer_reviews.author: J. Nunn

customer_reviews.title: Very strong smell!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to use for my boxing gloves which were getting a little stinky....and these smell very strong - which could be good or bad i guess depending - i got the "Linen" scent - I personally dislike strong smells - so I will be buying unscented charcoal inserts instead - but these certainly work!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: c b

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my gloves smelling great
customer_reviews.text: Biggest compliment I can say is that right after workout, when I was putting my sweaty gloves back in my bag with this, somebody in the locker room was asking around what that nice smell was. She could smell the lavender over everybody's sweaty musk! The smell is actually not overpowering and I like the fact that it hopefully will keep my gloves lasting a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Anon_i_mus

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!  Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! These work very, very, very well. My gloves smell like they just came out of the laundry. This is my 4th pair. They last about 6 months (and I do kickboxing 4-5x per week). Worth the money. I tried the Cedar version of Meister and wasn't thrilled. Not a fan of the Cedar smell and it definitely didn't last as long. No doubt about it, Linen is the way to go. In the beginning, it almost works TOO well. Everyone could smell it. FYI...I have tried a few brands and Meister/Linen is HANDS DOWN the best. Not even close.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: The scent was strong but nice but it never took away the smell in my ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm sorry to say these didn't work for me. The scent was strong but nice but it never took away the smell in my gloves and mixed with the sweat smell which was quite disgusting, to the point where I was embarrassed to wear them to class. I ended up going with another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Paul Ph.D.

customer_reviews.title: Keep my gloves dry and smelling fresh!
customer_reviews.text: I have had these for a year now. I got them to keep my boxing gloves dry because my gloves would still be wet a few days later when I slipped my hands into them. It was gross. Having these, my gloves are always dry when I go to a boxing class and they smell good! I love these and will use them till they don't work anymore, then I will buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Alie

customer_reviews.title: Microbiologist approved.
customer_reviews.text: Love these! I'm a Microbiologist and the sweaty glove thing had my brain screaming. These are wonderful! I got the lavender and it not only smells amazing, it acts like those little moisture packets in purses/bags/meds... It's working so well! It's also nice when carrying gloves, I hook then onto my tactical bag. Ive cultured my gloves twice now and they haven't grown any colonies.
customer_reviews.author: S A Undy

customer_reviews.title: Great scent! Absorb effectively
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. I have been using these for several weeks in my longsword fencing gloves (which are used three days a week and get very sweaty and gross). The inserts have left a lovely scent. In fact, I considered purchasing more just to hide around my house!
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: order them
customer_reviews.text: these just work. My son plays Lacrosse, but also likes to box, so we use them for both. Moms, These are a must if your teen likes to keep their gear in the bedroom, and if you ever want to walk in the room without getting knocked out from the smell of stinky gloves.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Ostrom

customer_reviews.title: Ok - very strong scent
customer_reviews.text: The smell is good, but very strong. I let mine air out for a few days. I could smell it throughout my house.Once the smell weakens I used them in my gloves. It covers up the smell but doesn’t get rid of it. Also will transfer to any hand wraps you have. Be prepared to smell it while using the gloves after you use it.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen G

customer_reviews.title: Maybe smells TOO good...
customer_reviews.text: This was a great buy for the fact that you NEED this if you are a boxer, or taking boxing classes, or whatever. This will help dry your gloves out quick, remove the stink, and overall increase the longevity of your gloves by taking care of them. While the scent is great... it's almost TOO strong. I could smell the scent permeating off the gloves the next day during my class - it was almost making me light-headed. Although, this is much better than smelling the 'funk'.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: They work.
customer_reviews.text: The scent is overwhelming, but that's almost welcome compared to the alternative. We got these for my kid whos gear smells like it's been in a sewer after a session. These work. Scent is strong, but I no longer have to drive home with the windows open
customer_reviews.author: A random joe

customer_reviews.title: Does the trick!
customer_reviews.text: This product does what it’s supposed to! My gloves and gym bag don’t stink anymore... however, the lavender scent I chose smells to me like a (clean) public restroom.. maybe like an office restroom or something. I’d like to try a new scent, bc it definitely works and definitely drys out the gloves as well!
customer_reviews.author: Brittani Smith

customer_reviews.title: The scent is WAY too strong
customer_reviews.text: Had to throw these away after one day, I should've returned but oh well. They have a very strong smell that isn't very pleasant (I got the lavender one). Would recommend the manufacturer tries other scents that don't smell like you're breathing in a container of windex/chemicals.
customer_reviews.author: Joel Rosado

customer_reviews.title: awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because I started kickboxing to get in shape. When I first opened them, they were slightly overwhelming with the clean crisp laundry scent. So I just placed them on a doorknob to "air out" over night. Since then, I put them in my gloves right after every workout, and my gloves smell amazing. My gloves dry out and smell like laundry. It's wonderful. I've only had these for about 2 months, but the scent is still strong.
customer_reviews.author: jewelbunz

customer_reviews.title: Do your gloves a favor and get these.
customer_reviews.text: I recently replaced my sparring gloves with a signifigant, and pricy, upgrade and I’d really like for these gloves to last. Between the moisture and the salt, your sweat can wreak havoc on a pair of leather boxing gloves, so I bought myself a pair of these for the first time. I love them. They draw all the moisture out of my gloves and leave them smelling like cedar, instead of the bottom of a gym bag.
customer_reviews.author: Rusker Doo

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: the smell is pretty potent for the first few days. i'd suggest leaving it out in the open for a few hours then put it in your gloves (or bag, whatever you want to use this for)also don't leave it for more than 3-4 hours cause your gloves will smell like it.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos

customer_reviews.title: The scent is unpleasant and too strong. Can't recommend.
customer_reviews.text: I bought it to keep my kickboxing gloves nice and fresh... my bad! The odor is overpowering. I regret ever putting it inside the gloves. Even after leaving them outside for two weeks and spraying with lysol multiple times, I still can't get rid of this horrible smell. It gives me a headache, had to throw it away.
customer_reviews.author: Yana

customer_reviews.title: Nice smell
customer_reviews.text: Nice strong, clean scent. My boxing gloves really stunk from sweat, and these have completely solved that problem. I spritz them with an essential oil cleaner, wipe them out and then let them sit with these in them until my next class. My gloves now smell lovely!
customer_reviews.author: Julie S.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for carrying your gloves too!
customer_reviews.text: I like putting these in my gloves and then slinging then over my shoulder or hanging them off my bag. Frees up room in my bag to carry other things, and it also smells really nice so when I need to freshen up a bag i just toss these in and close the zipper for a day. I also have a small bedroom, so if I leave them out my room will smell like the deodorizer and I weirdly like it!
customer_reviews.author: Fuu

customer_reviews.title: Great deodorizers, they actually work
customer_reviews.text: Wow these work way better than I expected. They are sliiightly on the strong smelling side (they'll definitely affect your gym bag if there are other things in there) for my own personal taste but it's not too extreme. They actually deodorize, too, instead of simply masking the smell with a stronger smell. I've been letting my gloves dry about 50% before putting these in there, not sure if that has anything to do with it.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Doe

customer_reviews.title: Really stops the horrible smell I used to deal with
customer_reviews.text: Works great. The scent was very strong, too strong at first, but after a couple of months they are perfect. They seem to help dry out the gloves and definitely removes the odor. I still make sure the gloves are not left in my bag so they can air out before my next session. I still wipe down the gloves with antibacterial wipes as soon as I am done with them, but these have really made a difference.
customer_reviews.author: NHCollegeKid

customer_reviews.title: Kicks oders butt and keeps your gloves fresh.
customer_reviews.text: These are powerful and absorb like crazy. I hate sweaty stinky gloves. These eliminate that problem with ease and keep your gloves together. The fragrances are great too. I ordered lavender and cedar and I like them a lot!
customer_reviews.author: will

customer_reviews.title: Love these things!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these glove deodorizers! I got 2 pairs of gloves and me and my cousins do a bit of sparring from time to time and with multiple people using the gloves, you know they’re bound to have a bunch of sweat and stench afterwards. I put these in the gloves after some sparring sessions and they didn’t leave any odor. I’d buy again and recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: nick arriaga

customer_reviews.title: Does not kill germs, but freshens the scent
customer_reviews.text: I would still disinfect (kill the germs) before using this item, BUT it works exactly as advertised. Gloves went from smelling of rotting cheese to smelling pleasantly of cedar. Other reviewers complain of overly strong smell, but I do not agree. Yes, it's strong, but it's not overpowering unless you stick the thing in your nose.
customer_reviews.author: G Man

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for gym bags and gloves
customer_reviews.text: this thing is awesome! I put them in my boxing gloves after heavy use... and man does it get the funk out of them! One thing to keep in mind be sure to select your sent carefully if you leave them in your car it will leave your car smelling like that sent.
customer_reviews.author: El Magnifico

customer_reviews.title: They work!
customer_reviews.text: These are great but I thought they were ones that you could buy a replacement scent bag to put inside...but they aren’t. I know others with these and said they lasted more than a year so not too bad to just replace the whole thing when scent runs out.
customer_reviews.author: todayhooks

customer_reviews.title: Cedar Scent is Ridiculously Strong
customer_reviews.text: The cedar scent is WAY too strong. It’s so strong that my fingers smelled of it just from handling a few seconds to stuff into my boxing gloves. The scent also made me catch my breath numerous times and seemed to affect my breathing. A woman at the gym said it takes a long while for the deodorizer scent to mellow.
customer_reviews.author: Sasha B.

customer_reviews.title: Game Changer
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing! My son's room smelled like old sweat all the time, and he keeps his clothes clean. His gloves he may have forgotten to stuff with socks once or twice. These deodorizers have eliminated all odor!
customer_reviews.author: ksk

customer_reviews.title: No more stinky boxing gloves
customer_reviews.text: No more stinky boxing gloves! These things did wonders, I was convinced I was going to have to throw out my gloves because they had become so musky. But these saved them, now they smell amazing and the scent lasts!!
customer_reviews.author: Caroline L.

customer_reviews.title: A must for Fire Academy
customer_reviews.text: These things work great. I used them for my structure firefighting gloves during my Firefighter 1 academy. Throughout the course of the day my gloves would get soaked both with sweat and water. These were helpful to throw into my gloves until I could get them home and onto a glove dryer. As soon as they were dry they would go right back in so I would have dry and good smelling gloves for at least the first hour of my day. Highly recommended. Works as a gear bag deodorizer when not in gloves. I recommend the Cologne scent. It is VERY strong at first but last a long time. Three months later they are still working strong.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Love these deodorizers! I box 4-5 times a week & these keep the stink out of my gloves & absorb any moisture that might be left from my sweaty paws. They usually last at least 3 months for me, and even then they still work, they're just not as strong once the 3rd or 4th month hits. I've started using them for my gym bag, car or shoes once they hit that point. These are the best ones I've used and I've purchased them repeatedly in the past year, I recommend them to everyone!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica M

customer_reviews.title: Strong Deodorizer Fresh Scent
customer_reviews.text: The fresh scent is strong and will remove any order from sweating in your gloves daily (Im using for boxing gloves) leaves them fresh for the next use every time. I can't speak to the durability having only owned them for a short time but so far, I am pleased with the product for the price its a great value.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Parker

customer_reviews.title: Definitely NOT cedar scented.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the cedar scented deodorizers, and that's definitely not what they smell like. I wasn't sent the wrong item, they just have the wrong label on the scent in my opinion. This isn't what you would typically expect of a cedar scent. Don't buy it if you want cedar chips. If you like the scent of balsam, however, these would be great. Of course we have a phenomenal balsam scented goods factory right near me here in Maine and if I wanted balsam I would have just gone there, but that's not what I wanted when I ordered these.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Got STINKY TEEN FEET?
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my son's boxing gloves, but we use them to un-stink closet and sneakers. Smells WAY better than those sneaker inserts! It's LAVENDAR. But not cloying, gross, lavendar, high quality flower lavendar. So good. We've had them about 6 months and still working great.
customer_reviews.author: Dinneen Viggiano

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had that long but they are great. Always have both gloves when it training time. Sucks out the moisture so no bad smells. The scent is strong for a couple weeks then it's much less.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan L.

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my boyfriend and they make his gloves smell sooo nice! It's a very pleasant scent and lasts a long time! He's had this deodorizer for a month so far and it still smells as strong as it did the first day!
customer_reviews.author: Cococo

customer_reviews.title: AWFUL STRONG SMELL - WARNING
customer_reviews.text: The smell that these have left in my glove completely ruined my brand new $120.00 gloves. The smell is so ridiculously strong and smells like dryer sheets that it almost makes you sick to your stomach. I have no idea how the reveries on this are so great. I purchase numerous items thru Amazon and never write reviews, but am so distraught by how awful these things smell and ruined my gloves for the time being (until they air out for 6 months) that I had to share it with everyone.
customer_reviews.author: leeh

customer_reviews.title: A must if you train with boxing gloves often
customer_reviews.text: I practice Muay Thai multiple days a week and this definitely helps with moisture and odor control in my gloves. Just like others say, when you first open the package the odor is very strong but after a few weeks it settles down a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: These deodorizers saved me from having to replace my boxing gloves too soon. Before this purchase, I wiped my gloves out often with bleach wipes, and they still stunk. These deodorizers tamed the stink.
customer_reviews.author: Robyn

customer_reviews.title: Whoa! Way to strong smelling!
customer_reviews.text: Whoa. The smell is way too intense. I could not stand being in the same house as these things! I literally had to hang them outside. There is no way I’d put these in my boxing gloves. I definitely would not want this on my skin. I am not a person that’s sensitive to scents, but holy moly - these are not for me.
customer_reviews.author: StepieJo

customer_reviews.title: Great for lacrosse gloves!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my son's stinky lacrosse gloves & LOVE these! We've tried sprays, sunshine, and fresh air, but nothing compares to the freshness these provide. Just purchased a second pair for his cleats. Absolutely worth it! The scent is fresh, although a tad strong at first (however compared to the glove smell, it's much preferred)
customer_reviews.author: SLM

product_meta.title: Meister Glove Deodorizers for Boxing and All Sports - Absorbs Stink and Leaves Gloves Fresh
product_meta.description: The Meister Nunchucks Glove & Shoe Deodorizers are the ultimate solution to sweaty and smelly gear. Post-workout moistures and odors are not only unpleasant, they also break down your gear over time. The Meister Nunchucks Deodorizers are a must for your gym bag to dry out your gloves and leave them smelling fresh for your next workout. Constructed from high quality flannel, these deodorizers are built to last. Stuffed inside is your choice between two highly absorbent and aromatic options: premium red Cedar chips or activated Fresh Linen blend. The porous flannel and superior absorbent fillings combine to draw moisture out of your gear, and leave it smelling refreshed. The Meister Deodorizers are built to fit perfectly into nearly all gloves and shoes, and the nunchucks design keeps your pairs together. They work great for boxing gloves, goalie gloves, ski gloves, hockey gloves, lacrosse gloves, shoes, and more. Get your Meister Nunchuck Deodorizers today and take the stink out of your stuff!
feature_bullets: Absorbs unwanted moisture and odor to keep gloves hygienic
Leaves gloves smelling fresh with Cedar, Fresh Linen, Cologne or Lavender aroma
Increases life of gloves by avoiding breakdown from moisture
High quality flannel and premium aromatic, absorbent fillings. Nunchucks design keeps gloves together
Works great for Boxing Gloves, Goalie Gloves, Hockey Gloves, Ski Gloves & more. Even fits perfectly in shoes!
